overview_of_class: This course will offer a close, comparative analysis of images the "other" in Israeli and Palestinian works of fiction and poetry. Thus, throughout the course we will closely examine images of the Palestinian in Israeli literature, as well as images of the Jew in Palestinian literature. We will points to metaphors and tropes of self and "other"; discusses questions of identity and counter-identity; and ponder on the large historical events, the political discourse and the ways in which they are complicated by literature.
name: Modern Hebrew Literature in Translation
topic: The Other in Israeli and Palestinian Literature
subject: COMP_LIT
